```{r, echo=FALSE}
enquote <- function(x) {
    paste0("'", x, "'")
}

f <- function(link) {
    is_active <- !is.na(link)
    if (is_active) {
        code <- paste0(
            paste0("<a href=", enquote(link), ">"),
            "<i class='fas fa-file-pdf fa-fw active'></i></a>"
        )
    } else {
        code <- "<i class='fas fa-file-pdf fa-fw inactive'></i>"
    }
    return(code)
}
```
